entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
